main.java.pieces

Class PieceBehaviour

  • Object
    • PieceBehaviour

  • public class PieceBehaviour
extends Object
    Class to validate the piece behavior in any kind of Chessboard.

    • Method Detail

      • isout

        public boolean isout(int x,
                     int y)
        Check if the x or y indexes are out of bounds
        Parameters:
        x - x-index
        y - y-index
        Returns:
        true when out of bounds, else false

      • checkMyPiece

        public boolean checkMyPiece(Piece piece,
                            int i,
                            int j)
        Check if there is a piece in a given x and y indexes
        Parameters:
        piece - the instance of the piece that calls the function
        i - x index on chessboard
        j - y index on chessboard
        Returns:
        true if the square is empty or the piece is from a different player , false if the square contains a piece of the same player or a King

      • otherOwner

        public boolean otherOwner(Piece piece,
                          int i,
                          int j)
        Check if piece has a different owner than the calling piece
        Parameters:
        piece - the instance of the piece that calls the function
        i - x index on chessboard
        j - y index on chessboard
        Returns:
        true if owner(player) is different
